snippet: Fighting in Aleppo, Syria’s commercial capital, threatens to damage irreparably the stunning architectural and cultural legacy left by 5,000 years of civilizations.
abstract: Preservationists and archaeologists warn that fighting in Aleppo, Syria, may damage the architectural and cultural legacy of the city, which is considered the world’s oldest continuously inhabited human settlement.
lead_paragraph: Fighting in Aleppo, Syria’s commercial capital, threatens to damage irreparably the stunning architectural and cultural legacy left by 5,000 years of civilizations.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
